mapper.sql: id , id_num idNum, phone_num phoneNum, y, score, score_model_type scoreModelType, is_del isDel, create_date createDate, update_date updateDate
mapper.insert:
insert into data_core (id_num, phone_num, y, score, score_model_type, is_del, create_date, update_date) values
( #{idNum}, #{phoneNum}, #{y}, #{score}, #{scoreModelType}, #{isDel}, now(), now() )
